objects.name: start_text
objects.string:
-- GameThingPrototype --

Survive the hordes of robots! Every ten seconds a switch activates a different group of enemies, stay sharp!

Move with WASD, hold the Mouse left button to aim and release it for shooting.

Press or shoot the Floor buttons to activate traps. You can even push unactive enemies onto them!

-- PRESS ANY KEY OR TOUCH(MOBILE) TO CONTINUE --

objects.name: gameover_text
objects.string:
-- GAME OVER --

Your score: 

Highest Score:

-- CLICK OR TOUCH TO RESTART --

events.comment: God Mode
Infinite Ammo
Change Weapons
Load Level from External Layout, using the Global Variable from scene "mainMenu"
Reset level XP
Press ESC to get back to Main Menu.
Hide Dev Objects
Camera behavior
At the beginning of the game, hide unused layers, freeze game in background and display game info.

events.name: Change info texts depending on device

parameters:

+ NewLine() +
"Press or shoot the Floor buttons to activate traps. You can even push unactive enemies onto them!" + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +
"-- TOUCH TO CONTINUE --"

"-- GameThingPrototype --" + NewLine() 
+ NewLine() +
"Survive the hordes of robots! Every ten seconds a switch activates a different group of enemies, stay sharp!" + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +

Also adds cumulative XP from the round with global var "game_xp"

events.comment: Delete particles after processing highscore and gameOver layer to make the transition to gameOver look more smooth
Initialise changeState timer when game starts
Switch, add +100 XP to Player Progression and +1 to Level Progression
Toggle active states when needed
UI Bar

events.name: Collision effects based on activated state

events.comment: Push inactive enemies
Trigger death when Player Center is in collision with an active hazard

events.name: Change animations based on activated state
Change use in pathfinding based on activated state

events.comment: Start and stop path obstacle behaviour of a trap depending on whether is it active or not
Start and stop path finding depending on whether an enemy is activated or not. Note that while the player is dead, that path finding of enemies stops
Stop trappers when inactive and pause their move charge cycle
Change the virtual grid offset to change what the enemy can target. Cycle through this until the correct cycle is found
Initialiase Trapper with a random direction and given them a timer for their move charge cycle
Trigger both traps when play is on trap button
mobilecontrols
Crosshair
Score
Change the animation of the healthbar to match that of the tank
Limit size of holdAim so the max width of bulletReady looks nice
Initialize pulsate tween.
No pickups in the scene: hide the indicator.
At least one pickup in the scene: start the behavior.
Pickup is far away: show the Indicator, move it to the Pickup with the right angle.
Pickup is below a distance treshold: the Indicator is placed on top of the Pickup, angled downward.
Indicator has a behavior to always show on screen, even if out of camera.
Pulsating tween loop.
Give Starting Weapon from loadouts
Weapon spawn object - give +3 ammo, pick a random weapon

* charged single shot.
* can pierce though enemies, +1 multiplier for every killed one.
Also sets the Speed of P1, watch out!
Calculate Score by adding +1 for every Enemy hit, then multiply 100 by that number.

* instant shot.
* Travel force of the bullet diminishes the longer it goes.
* Once in collision with a wall or enemy, the bullet sticks to it.
* when the bullet has stopped, it flashes for 1/2 second and explodes, creating an increasing explosive radius of max 24px.
* enemies within the radius take 2 hitpoints once, every killed enemy contributes to multiplier score by 1.5x
Define initial properties
Has active weapon
Can have only ONE Bullet at a time, check is here

Two Steps/ticks for bullet travelling

1) starts travelling at full speed, goes at 320px for 0.33 secs
2) then, if no obstacles have been found, goes at 80px for 0.33 secs

* whenever the bullet collides with a wall it should stop right away -- STICKY PART TO DO!
* Bullet stops, then creates an Explosion object starting at 0% scale. When it reaches 100% destroys itself and can shoot again
Should also shake the camera, currently bugged
* Explosion hits enemies and player in radius

* instant shot.
* short range weapon, needs reloading for every shot by pressing Fire again.
* shoots a spread of mini-bullets in a cone radius at once, 5-6 pellets.
* every pellet has a different direction and force, they should be able to be edited from the Bullet behavior.
* every pellet deals 0.5 hitpoints, so in order to kill a grunt you need to hit with at least 2 pellets.
Collisions
Delete bullet_scatter after a short duration
Add to total score the score of the enemy
Remove health bars for dead enemies
Display score after enemy dies
Play an hitsound, delete the Enemy, add +10XP for each kill
Initial Properties

Create a Tiled Belt Object on top of every single one, defined by its "belt_direction" variable placed in-editor, and use the function to define the movement. ( Angles: East=0°; South=90°; West=180°; North=270° )
Move the Offset of the Tiled objects, giving the illusion of movement
Collision with Belts, move Player and Enemies
Change Belt Direction every time there's a Switch State: from East to West, From South to North.
Tiles that kills Player/Enemies. Useful for boundaries and pits.
